content:
B35/S236

Dean Hickerson and I have been looking at an interesting Life variant, B35/S236. Unlike Life, pools of chaos in this rule tend to grow rather than stabilizing, so in Wolfram's classification this is class 3. However, it seems to contain all the ingredients for universality.
  • Still Lifes and Oscillators
  • Gliders and Spaceships
  • Glider Reactions
  • Glider and Spaceship Guns
  • Glider Shuttles
  • Glider Logic
  • Construction Universality
  • Puffers and Rakes
  • Quadratic Growth
  • Open Questions

Cellular Automata -- D. Eppstein -- UCI Inf. & Comp. Sci.
